variable.comment: This is the number of the last level in your game, remember to increase this as you add more levels!

variable.comment: This is a "flag" the game uses to know when you have completed a level
variable.name: LevelComplete

variable.comment: This is the first level that the game should start with, useful to change this to test later levels!

variable.comment: This controls which character the player will be using (1 to 5)
variable.name: PlayerCharacter

variable.comment: This is how much time you are giving the player to complete your level
variable.name: LevelTime

variable.comment: How many lives the player starts the game with
variable.name: Lives

variable.comment: This controls the speed of the enemies in your game, increase it to make it harder, reduce it to make it easier
variable.name: EnemySpeed

variable.comment: This is a "flag" the game uses to know if you've pressed continue
